==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|えん|ぎ|しゃ|yomi=on}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=えんぎしゃ|演技|tr1=engi|t1=performance, acting|者|tr2=sha|t2=person}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|n|え|んぎ|しゃ}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ẽ̞ɴŋiɕʲa̠]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|えんぎしゃ}}

# a [[performer]], an [[actor]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|actor}} {{ja-l|俳優|はいゆう|haiyū}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|えん|ぎ|もの|yomi=irreg}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=えんぎもの|演技|tr1=engi|t1=performance, acting|者|tr2=mono|t2=person}}, using the [[訓読み|''kun'yomi'']] of ''mono'' for the {{ja-l|者}} character.

This reading may be considered [[irregular]].

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ẽ̞ɴŋimo̞no̞]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|えんぎもの}}

# a [[performer]], an [[actor]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|actor}} {{ja-l|俳優|はいゆう|haiyū}}
